data_table.description: The dataset includes information about subjects' Parkinson disease status and sociodemographic (e.g. onset age/gender) data.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Unique subject names which have been deidentified from their original studies to protect participant's privacy

variable.name: PARKINSONS
variable.description: Parkinson's disease status coded as 0 = control and 1 = case, from clinic visit using modified UK Brain Bank Criteria for diagnosis

variable.name: FEMALE
variable.description: Gender coded as 0 = male and 1 = female, confirmed by concordant clinical record and genetic estimates from the X chromosome

variable.name: AGE
variable.description: Age at onset in years for Parkinson's disease cases or age at last clinic visit for controls

variable.name: COHORT
variable.description: Indicates the study subset or center from which data were contributed.
